import i18next from"i18next";import{initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import ru from"./locale/ru";import en from"./locale/en";var saveToLocaStorage=function saveToLocaStorage(lang){localStorage.setItem('lang',lang);};export var getLocale=function getLocale(){if(localStorage.getItem('lang')){return localStorage.getItem('lang');}var navigatorObject=window.navigator;var language=navigatorObject?navigatorObject.language:"ru";return language.substr(0,2).toLowerCase();};i18next.use(initReactI18next).init({resources:{en:en,ru:ru},lng:getLocale(),fallbackLng:getLocale(),// debug: process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production',
